text: Another week!! We had a packed one. Jersey for school even though the Pirates… whomp whomp. Rainy day scoot. Talking to the geese too. Calling them, haha. Can’t stop eating the caprese toast from my new book! Blooms making me so happy. My mom and I saw Peter Pan this week! First, we had this tempura vegetable tower that was unreal. Went out to dinner with cousins!! They had a blast. He’s basically an adult! Baby Sebby! Then it was time for Emilia’s play!! Her costume was hilarious… they did Sing and she played Eddie Noodleman. She was sooo cute and funny. Basically the comedic relief! I love how much she loves it. Jordan kept saying “Emilia is so sweet!” A little hockey! Emilia had two shows, and while we were at the second, Eddie and Jordan tagged along to a birthday party with Max. Boys night! And that’s a wrap!
html:
Another week!!

We had a packed one.

Jersey for school even though the Pirates… whomp whomp.

Rainy day scoot.

Talking to the geese too.

Calling them, haha.

Can’t stop eating the caprese toast from my new book!

Blooms making me so happy.

My mom and I saw Peter Pan this week!

First, we had this tempura vegetable tower that was unreal.

Went out to dinner with cousins!!

They had a blast.

He’s basically an adult!

Baby Sebby!

Then it was time for Emilia’s play!!

Her costume was hilarious… they did Sing and she played Eddie Noodleman.

She was sooo cute and funny. Basically the comedic relief!

I love how much she loves it.

Jordan kept saying “Emilia is so sweet!”

A little hockey!

Emilia had two shows, and while we were at the second, Eddie and Jordan tagged along to a birthday party with Max.

Boys night!

And that’s a wrap!
